name: Sizzlin’ Steak Tacos
description: Donair Seasoning and orange juice make an unlikely duo but yield the most amazingly tender & flavourful steak. Tucked away in warmed tortillas and piled high with your favourite taco fillings, this meal is best served with a cold bevvy.
preparation: Slice steak against the grain into 1⁄3"-thick strips; place in a bowl. Add orange juice, 1 tbsp oil, and seasoning. Toss to coat. Set aside to marinate.

In Sauté Pan, heat remaining 1 tbsp oil. Add steak in a single layer, if possible. Cook in two batches, if required. Cook 1 min, flip, then cook additional 1 min–1 min 30 sec, or until steak is done to your liking.
Add steak, avocado, tomato, and onion to tortillas and serve with toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice.
